name: Necromarket
description:
Controls:

  • WASD or CURSOR KEYS for movement
  • SPACE or SHIFT to interact
  • M to toggle music

Stuck?

  • Click the door to start/end each day! 
  • Combine items on the altar in the middle.

Coded in 72 hours for LD44 using LibGDX and artemis-odb. If you enjoy our game be sure to rate it!
